title: Invasion Gamemode Rewards
body:
Today the invasion gamemode was released but I have one concern about the rewards. The rewards are 4 tokens and there are only 4 missions, 2 of each that you're forced to play with a premade group of 5.
As a guy with no friends to play invasion I really want the new ward but I do not have any friends to play the premade missions.
What should I do? I really want the new ward.
I appreciate any solution.{{champion:32}}

Yeah, but that's also when Riot will start nerfing any good strategies. Remember Brand on the last incarnation of Doom Bots?

Sure, the completely OP stuff got nerfed (brand, sion/karthus passive), but by the end of the first round of doom bots I could pretty reliably handle the teemoing at 100 difficulty, and the majority of the same strategies worked almost as effectively the second time it came around. (My role in doom bot land being a Q max AP janna for example.)

Here theres only so many champions, and also people have predetermined amounts of gold. People will eventually have optimised build paths and guides so it's like "round 1: buy X, Y, Z on MF, A, B, C on janna, etc., Round 2 buy..." level of specificity.

It may be that some weirder builds are actually best, so stuff like AP MF or AP ezreal, or on-hit lulu or various other less conventional uses of the champs come out ahead. It's just a matter of people figuring out what works best.

As it turns out, on-hit builds ft. rageblade are turning out to be pretty effective, particularly due to the synergy with ardent.

Time will tell if theres even more potent builds, but naively trying to build the same as on rift doesn't seem like the best use of the gold budget.
